Readings

This page lists all the readings suggested throughout the course. To see where each of them is mentioned, please refer to the class or lab pages.

  1. Anselin, L. (2002). Under the hood Issues in the specification and interpretation of spatial regression models. Agricultural Economics, 27(3): 247-267.
  2. Anselin, L. (2003). Spatial externalities, spatial multipliers, and spatial econometrics. International Regional Science Review, 26(2): 153-166.
  3. Anselin, L. (2005). Exploring spatial data with GeoDaTM: a workbook. Center for Spatially Integrated Social Science.
  4. Anselin, L; Amaral, P. V.; Arribas-Bel, D. (2012) Technical Aspects of Implementing GMM Estimation of the Spatial Error Model in PySAL and GeoDaSpace. GeoDa Center Technical Report. [Source code]
  5. Bivand, R.; Piras, G. (in press). Comparing Implementations of Estimation Methods for Spatial Econometrics. Forthcoming in Journal of Statistical Software
  6. Gibbons, S.; Overman, H. G.; Patacchini, E. (2014). Spatial Methods. SERC Discussion Paper 162.
  7. Goodchild, M. F.; Longley, P. A. (2013). The Practice of Geographic Information Science. In Fischer, M. M. and Nijkamp, P., editors, Handbook of Regional Science. Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg
  8. Haining, R. (2013). Spatial Data and Statistical Methods: A Chronological Overview. In Fischer, M. M. and Nijkamp, P., editors, Handbook of Regional Science. Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg
  9. Le Gallo, J. (2013) Cross-Section Spatial Regression Models. In Fischer, M. M. and Nijkamp, P., editors, Handbook of Regional Science. Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg
  10. McKinney, W. (2012) Python for Data Analysis. Oâ€™Reilly Media.
  11. McKinney, W. (2013) 10-minute tour of pandas. Vimeo.
  12. Pandas development team (2014) Pandas documentation. Online resource.
  13. Pinkse, J. and Slade, M. The future of spatial econometrics. Journal of Regional Science, 50(1): 103-117.
  14. QGIS Project (2014). QGIS User Guide. Release 2.2.
  15. Symanzik, J. (2013). Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis. In Fischer, M. M. and Nijkamp, P., editors, Handbook of Regional Science. Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg
